subject: Thank you for your recent refinance debt request, we are ready to lend you money regardless of Credit
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE pocket money to spend ANY way you like, or simply need to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this tender will expire THIS NIGHT):
$386,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill out this quick form... 
Do not worry about approval, your credit score will not disqualify you!
http://doubleransalt.com/
